item.title: OWASP BWA VM settings
item.description: Download the OWASP BWA VM: https://www.vulnhub.com/entry/owasp-broken-web-applications-project-12,46/ Network settings VM startup Just start the VM. After a few seconds, it will display its IP address. No need to login for the moment. Just access the IP address in your browser and you’re ready to go!
